entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
